body.name: Smart Watch for Women IP68 Waterproof, Round Women's Watch for iOS Android Phones Fitness Tracker Smartwatch with Heart Rate Monitor Steps/Sleep Tracker Slim Gold (Sport & Metal Bands Included), LYNN
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 7 mins
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Smart Watches For Women & Personalized Watch Faces】: The SHANG WING LYNN smart watch with 1.1" TFT full-touch color screen can provide you with smooth using and visual experience. The sleek frame design is elegant and anti-scratch. Express your style with 50 plus watch faces in the InxFit App, or customize with your own photos. Make your own unique dials to meet your mood and outfit style.

【24 Hrs Blood Oxygen/Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】: This women’s smart watch can detect and analyze your 24/7 Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen Saturation and Sleep Duration/Quality, as well as recording Female Menstrual Period. Help you to build a healthier, more active lifestyle.

【All-day Activity & Fitness Tracker】: This fitness tracker watch has 12 built-in sports modes, allowing you to get real-time data for your favorite sports, like walking, running and yoga, cycling, etc. The fitness watch will also track your daily activity data including steps, distance, calories burned. Record your health data in your wrist.

【Smart Watch for iPhone and Android Phones】: The InxFit APP for this smartwatch is compatible with iOS 9.0/Android 6.0 or above Smartphones. The women's wrist watch will vibrate to remind you once there is incoming call, text message, social media notification, etc.. Brings more convenience into your daily life and work.

【Multi-function & IP68 Waterproof】: The women digital watch is designed with IP68 Waterproof level, which is waterproof and sweat-resistant, and can even be worn while swimming. It also features with many practical tools such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, breath training, music control, stopwatch, find your phone, do not disturb switch, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24/7 Heart Rate Monitoring Our heart rate monitor watch can track your heart rate all day, you can also see the real-time heart rate changes during the workout. So you can more quickly and easily understand your health condition. IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch Thanks to the IP68 standard waterproof level design, this waterproof watch allows you to wash your hand, do the dishes, running in the rain, sweating exercises without worries. 10+ Built-in Sports Modes The watch can track sports data for more than 10 different sports including Walking / Running / Yoga / Hiking / Rope Skipping / Dancing / Cycling / Aerobics / Badminton / Tennis.

Menstrual Cycle Tracking Use this fitness tracker to record your current menstrual period in the "InxFit" App, then the watch will provide predictions and reminders for upcoming menstrual periods. Blood Oxygen Monitoring When you feel tired, exhausted or even just feeling uneasy after work or exercise, use this smart watch with blood oxygen monitor to easily initiate a manual SpO2 to get your blood-oxygen saturation in as quick as 25 seconds, to better understand your physical state. Smart Notifications The smart watch can timely vibrate to remind you of the SMS messages, incoming calls and other social media apps' notifications including Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Messenger, email, linkedin, instagram, etc.

Slim Design, Also Fit for Girls and Boys This watch has slim and stylish design. The band size is adjustable, which can fit for kids too. Look! How beautiful it is on a girl's wrist! Monitor Your Sleep Quality This Lynn smart watch can record the sleep characteristics at each stage and analyze your sleep quality. View more detailed sleep data and holistic analysis graph of your sleep in the "InxFit" App. *Note: only record the sleep which is over 3 hours. Weather Forecast Connect the Lynn round smart watch to the “InxFit” App, turn on the “Weather Forecast" function. Then you can get the weather forecast and also the max/min temperature every day, help you to plan your outdoors exercise more effectively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smartwatch at best value!!
reviews.reviewText: I totally fell in love with Shang Wing Women's Smartwatch. Its metal band and round dial is so beautiful and visually appealing. It’s so easy and comfortable to wear and I love the fact that it also came with extra band. It also has so many cool features like 24-hour heart rate monitor and comprehensive fitness tracking capabilities make it an indispensable tool for health-conscious individuals like me.The waterproof design adds a layer of versatility, allowing to confidently wear it in various settings. Whether you're into intense workouts or daily activities, this smartwatch can keep up. Beyond its core features, the multifunctionality of the Shang Wing Women's Smartwatch sets it apart. It seamlessly integrates into your lifestyle, offering a range of functions that go beyond the conventional, making it a stylish and reliable companion for every occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Accurate Fitness Watch
reviews.reviewText: I've had a few fitness trackers over the past couple of years, and this one is my favorite for now. One of the things I like best about it is that it looks like a regular watch. The face is large and round, so it's easier to read and use the touch screen. Even though the screen is larger, it doesn't look or feel big and bulky. The band is soft and comfortable against my small wrist, and there are several notches to accommodate any wrist size. It has features that track your steps, monitor your heart rate, check your blood oxygen levels, record your sleep cycles and workouts, etc. As for workouts, there are several fitness activities to choose from (cycling, walking, yoga, etc.), but if none of them matches your activity, you can choose "other." As far as I can tell, it's very accurate with my steps and heart rate, and fairly accurate at reporting my sleep cycles. (I don't think anything you wear on your wrist can be expected to break down sleep cycles with 100% accuracy; I've had previous fitness trackers indicate that I was sleeping at times when I was just very still but very much awake. This feature will give you a good baseline of the length and quality of your sleep, but that's about all.) The only (somewhat) negative thing I can say about this watch is that it's claim of being waterproof is a bit misleading. You can wear it while jogging in the rain, washing your hands, sweating profusely, and things of that nature, but apparently it wasn't designed for swimming. So I would say it's water resistant but not waterproof; don't submerge it in water and expect it to keep functioning accurately. A couple of other things worth mentioning are that you have a few different options for how the display looks, and you are able to change distance to miles and weight to pounds (the default is set to metric). Also, the mobile app is easy to navigate, and the watch battery lasts me about a week (but I don't leave it connected to bluetooth all the time). Would I recommend this watch? Yes, absolutely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great smartwatch for those not looking for an exercise watch
reviews.reviewText: I like a watch with smart features (phone notifications, etc), combined with fitness features (workout tracking, etc.). I work in as a substitute teacher in an elementary school, so I need smart features on my watch. I also exercise regularly, so I need a watch that records heart rate, time, distance, different activities, etc.I have had the watch for 3 or 4 days now, and feel like I can give you a pretty good idea of what I like and what I don’t like.I exercise 6 to 7 days a week. I live in Upstate NY, so right now, most of my workouts are done on a treadmill or on my indoor bike. I currently wear a Garmin Venu Square Music watch ($150 when I purchased it), but was getting sick of the square face, so I ordered this to check it out.PACKAGING:It arrived in a small Amazon box. In the box was a compact, nice looking watch box. In the box, there was the watch, a magnetic charger, and an instruction manual, an extra watch strap, and a small screw driver to change the watch strap (see picture). The extra watch strap was a nice surprise.LOOKS:This watch has a round face and is all black. The watch band is a silicone watch band that can be switched out with the replacement, but I don’t think you could switch it out with any band that you wanted to purchase on Amazon. It has to be specific, which is why I think it came with an extra. I prefer the sport type bands that tuck under instead of on the outside, but it’s not that big of a deal.SET UP/DIRECTIONS:Set up with the included directions was super simple. In fact, the only directions I had to follow were to install the app with the QR code that conveniently came up immediately on the watch. As soon as the app was installed, I just followed the directions in there and was able to set the watch up easily. The Bluetooth immediately connected, but I do have trouble keeping it connected. I frequently go in to the app, pull down to sync and get an error that says “sync failed”. I must do that 2 -3 times to get it to work. When it’s not synced correctly, I end up missing notifications. PLEASE NOTE: When I first set up the watch, it didn’t give me the option to pick the Imperial system of measurement. For example, my weight had to be set up in kilograms, and my height had to be set up in millimeters. I did, however, find where to change that setting later.COMPATIBLE APPS:I like my watch to sync to fitness apps like Strava and Myfitnesspal. It does sync with Apple Heath, but I don’t use that app much.NOTIFICATIONS:This watch functions very well with notifications from my phone. You can choose what things you want to be notified for and which things you don’t want notifications for. I can read and delete notifications for most messages right from the watch (calendar, email, text, facebook, Instagram, messenger). When my phone rings, the watch lets me know who’s calling. Calls can be rejected from the watch. There is no speaker or microphone, so you can’t answer calls from the watch. I can’t find a way to change the notification buzz, however. Usually, there is a setting for a lower buzz or a higher buzz.DISPLAY:The display is very colorful and clear. I have set up so that when I flick my wrist, the display turns on. I’ve tried turning the screen on by just touching it, but that doesn’t work. If it doesn’t turn on when I flick my wrist, I have to push the button on the side to see the display. One thing I really hate is that I can’t get the display to turn on when I’m in “exercise” mode. I have shaken my arm, flicked my wrist, and flung my arm around to get the display to turn on to no avail. I have to push the button on the side to get the watch to turn on. This is a PAIN when you are exercising, especially when cycling. I have to take both hands off the bike to see the watch. There are many watch faces available, which surprised me. I especially liked the Christmas ones, but I found that those don’t have many stats showing on the main screen. I like to see time, date, step count, and heart rate. There are some that have that though!!. Heart rate monitor works well. I compared it to my chest strap and found that it’s about 3 to 4 beats faster than my chest strap.OTHER SETTINGS:1. Music control – works as it should. I can use the watch to start and pause the music on my phone.2. Healthcare – gives you menstrual and ovulation predictions.3. Timer & stopwatch – I could not find this at first, but when I contacted the seller, they were quick to get back to me. If you push the side button to get to the settings, then scroll down, you'll find more settings options that I didn't see at first.4. Alarms – alarms can be set on this watch.5. Sleep tracker – I honestly don’t pay much attention to this on any watch, but this watch does track sleep. All info can be found on the app.EXERCISE:I’ve only used this to track a couple rides on my indoor bike. I do like to run though, so I started a run activity on the watch to see what happens. It just counts down from 3 and starts. There is no GPS or ability to pair it with your phone to track GPS.There are 13 different activity modes built into the app (walking, running, bicycle, hiking, rope skipping, spinning, dance, yoga, aerobics, badminton, tennis, and other sports). I don’t see any way to add different sports or to re-organize or order sports so that your favorites are at the top.BATTERY:This thing has amazing battery life. I can go many days without charging and it’s still at 80%.IP68:I haven’t done more than test this watch under running water, but I like the fact that I can wear it while swimming.BOTTOM LINE – If you’re looking for a smartwatch with a great price, you really can’t go wrong with this watch. It does everything that they say it does, and it does it well. I would suggest this watch to anyone just starting out with a smartwatch. That being said, if you’re looking for a good fitness watch that includes GPS with combined smart capabilities, this probably isn’t for you. You’re better off with a watch that is specifically made for those who exercise regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fantastic Wearable
reviews.reviewText: This smart watch has been nothing short of a game-changer. With its sleek design and multitude of handy features, this watch is truly a blend of technology and style. Its fitness tracking capabilities have allowed me to stay on top of my health goals, and the fact that I can access my emails, calls, and messages right from my wrist is incredibly convenient.But what truly sets this smart watch apart is its battery life. Even with regular use, I only find myself needing to charge it every few days. And did I mention it's water-resistant too? Whether I'm sweating it out at the gym or caught in a sudden downpour, I never have to worry about damaging it.All in all, this smart watch has exceeded my expectations. It's comfortable, practical, and a wonderful companion for both my daily routine and fitness regimen. If you're considering a smart watch, I highly recommend giving this one a chance.

reviews.reviewTitle: Le rapport qualité/prix me convient parfaitement car cette montre répond bien à mes besoins.
reviews.reviewText: Je suis très contente de cette montre connectée que j’ai acheté il y a quelques semaines. Elle fonctionne très bien et sa batterie tient vraiment longtemps (1h30 maximum de charge avec une prise USB spéciale pour plus de 10 jours)Elle n’est pas trop grosse et je peux la régler à la taille de mon petit poigné. J’aime beaucoup sa couleur violette et son cadran chromé qui la rend esthétique). Elle est très légère et semble solideJe peux choisir le fond d’écran qui me plait ainsi que l’affichage souhaité. J’ai préféré mettre une photo que j’aime beaucoup (j’adore le résultat).Ces options fonctionnent bien (fréquence cardiaque, sports, relaxation, taux d’oxygénation du sang,…)Je suis avertie lorsque j’ai un appel (il s’affiche sur l’écran de ma montre et je peux je refuser via ma montre si je le souhaite. J’ai désactivé les notifications des messages (sms, whatsapp, … car je ne voulais pas me faire envahir par ceux-ci), tout est réglable sur l’application.J’ai réglé ma montre via l’application sur mo téléphone pour qu’elle me rappelle de boire régulièrement (nous choisissons la fréquence souhaitée).J’adore l’option concernant la qualité du sommeil qui apparait directement sur ma montre sous forme de frise colorée (je peux voir mon sommeil léger, profond, paradoxal, les éventuelles phases de réveils, la durée).Je sais combien je fais de pas quotidiennement, et je peux avoir une idée sur la qualité de mas journées (trop sédentaire par exemple)Elle est facile à régler et simple d’utilisation. J’ai mis un peu de temps à la connecter à mon téléphoneLors de la première utilisation, Il y a un QR code à flasher mais il ne fonctionnait pas trop sur mon téléphone, j’ai donc installé l’application Inxfit directement et là tout s’est connecté automatiquement. Le mode d’emploi est en 5 langues différentes (10 pages, informations complètes).La livraison a été très rapide et le colis en parfait état : le coffret est esthétique, complet avec le chargeur et le mode d’emploi.Elle est résistante à l’eau mais attention pas à l’eau de mer (IP68)

The media could not be loaded. è un dispositivo versatile e affidabile progettato per migliorare il tuo stile di vita attivo. Offre una serie di funzionalità avanzate che lo rendono una scelta eccellente per chi cerca un compagno di allenamento e monitoraggio della salute.Design e Comfort:L’orologio ha un design moderno ed elegante con un display touchscreen nitido e colorato. La cintura regolabile si adatta comodamente al polso, assicurando che tu possa indossarlo tutto il giorno senza alcun disagio.Funzionalità Principali: • Monitoraggio del Battito Cardiaco: Il sensore integrato fornisce una lettura precisa del battito cardiaco in tempo reale, aiutandoti a mantenere il controllo durante l’allenamento. • Conteggio dei Passi: Ti aiuta a tenere traccia dei tuoi passi quotidiani e a fissare obiettivi per mantenerti attivo • Notifiche per Smartphone: Ricevi messaggi, chiamate e avvisi direttamente sull’orologio, senza dover estrarre il telefono.App Mobile:L’app complementare è intuitiva e offre una panoramica dettagliata dei tuoi dati, consentendoti di impostare obiettivi personalizzati e monitorare il tuo progresso nel tempo.Autonomia della Batteria:L’autonomia della batteria è solida, con una carica che può durare diversi giorni, a seconda dell’uso.

Ich bin begeistert von dieser Fitnessuhr. Das Design ist sehr schön und sie hat alle gängigen Funktionen einer Sportuhr die man braucht, welche sehr präzise messen. Die Bedienung der Uhr ist sehr einfach und sie lässt sich leicht mit der App verbinden. Was mir auch sehr gefällt ist das der Akku lange hält und die Uhr schnell wieder aufgeladen ist. Zudem kann man zwischen mehreren verschiedenen Zifferblättern wählen oder ein eigenes Lieblingsfoto nehmen. Die Smartwatch sitzt gut am Handgelenk und man merkt sie kaum weil sie so leicht ist. Außerdem ist sie sehr gut für schmale Handgelenke geeignet da sie nicht so groß wie viele andere Sportuhren ist. Die Farben finde ich alle schön. Ich habe sie in schwarz genommen. Laut Hersteller ist sie wasserdicht was ich noch nicht getestet habe, aber gut zu wissen. Diese Smartwatch kann ich wirklich nur weiterempfehlen, es ist eine Fitnessuhr für ein super Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis für den kleineren Geldbeutel. Meine Ansprüche werden erfüllt und die Uhr ist qualitativ hochwertig. Tolle Smartwatch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really impressed with the quality of this watch. Came through the letter box, has an extra strap with it which is an absolute bargain as you don’t usually get this and was really easy to charge and set up!I’ve been wearing it since it came, the battery life appears to be fantastic, it’s tracking my steps and heart rate well, with an added feature of measuring my oxygen level which is great. Last night I fell asleep with the watch on and it tracked my sleep pattern well which is interesting to see.My favourite feature is being able to change the watch face to a picture from your phone, there are also plenty of premade watch faves available to select so you don’t get bored !I’m able to control my music, and select which apps that are comparable with the watch from my phone to receive notifications for, although I’m not able to reply this is great as I know who has messaged / who is calling before looking for my phone.Overall, the watch is great, absolutely amazing price and I would definitely purchase again and recommend to anyone looking for something sleek and something that works !

Ho acquistato questo smartwatch perché è più piccolo e più elegante rispetto ad altri modelli e sono rimasta piacevolmente sorpresa anche della comodità e leggerezza una volta indossato.Ha un diametro di soli 40 mm. Il quadrante e il cinturino dell'orologio hanno un design alla moda. Ha l'eleganza degli orologi tradizionali, può essere utilizzato come orologio quotidiano ed è anche un buon assistente per lo sport.Infatti monitorizza fino a 12 tipi di sport diversi.Puoi associare l'orologio smart ad uno smartphone compatibile e ricevere le notifiche di e-mail, chiamate, SMS, e messaggi delle APP social (come Facebook, WhatsAPP, Telegram, ecc.) direttamente sull'orologio.La sua scatola contiene l'orologio, un cinturino di ricambio, il cavo caricatore, le istruzioni e un piccolo cacciavite per cambiare più facilmente il cinturino.Si carica in meno di 2 ore e la sua batteria ha una durata di 7 giorni per un uso normale.Molto carino il fatto che si possa personalizzare il quadrante e adattarlo al tuo umore o al tuo colore preferito.Lo consiglio sia per se stessi ma anche per fare un regalo, sarà gradito.
